member.name: WICDdsAlphaMode
member.summary: Specifies the the meaning of pixel color component values contained in the DDS image.

member.name: WICDdsAlphaMode.WICDdsAlphaModeUnknown
member.summary: Alpha behavior is unspecified and must be determined by the reader.

member.name: WICDdsAlphaMode.WICDdsAlphaModeOpaque
member.summary: The alpha data is opaque (UNORM value of 1). This can be used by a compliant reader as a performance optimization. For example, blending operations can be converted to copies.

member.name: WICDdsAlphaMode.WICDdsAlphaModeCustom
member.summary: The alpha channel contains custom data that is not alpha.
